com.communote.server.core.tag

Interface TagParser

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTagParser, BlankTagParser, CommaTagParser

    public interface TagParser
    A tag parser tags an string and splits them into single words (the tags)
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends TagName>
      String      		 buildTagString(Collection<T> tags)
      This method builds a string tag list out of a collection of tags.
      <T extends TagName>
      String      		 buildTagString(Collection<T> tags, boolean sort)
      This method builds a string tag list out of a collection of tags.
      <T extends TagName>
      String      		 buildTagString(String[] tags)
      This method builds a string tag list out of a collection of tags.
      String combineTags(String tagList, String tagsToAdd)
      Combines two tags to a list.
      Pair<List<Tag>,List<String>> findOrCreateTags(String unparsedTags)
      Parses the tags and gets them from the database, and creates them if necassary.
      List<Tag> findTags(String unparsedTags)
      Parses the tags and gets them from the database.
      String getSeparator()
      Get the separator which separates the tags
      String[] parseTags(String unparsedTags)
      Parse a string of one or more tags into an array of tags.

    • Method Detail

      • buildTagString

        <T extends TagName> String buildTagString(Collection<T> tags)
        This method builds a string tag list out of a collection of tags. It is the reverse method of findTags. The tags will not be sorted.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type implementing the TagName interface
        Parameters:
        tags - the tag list
        Returns:
        the tag list as string, separated by a tag separator

      • buildTagString

        <T extends TagName> String buildTagString(Collection<T> tags,
                                          boolean sort)
        This method builds a string tag list out of a collection of tags. It is the reverse method of findTags
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type implementing the TagName interface
        Parameters:
        tags - the tag list
        sort - true if the list should be sorted by the name of the tags
        Returns:
        the tag list as string, separated by a tag separator

      • buildTagString

        <T extends TagName> String buildTagString(String[] tags)
        This method builds a string tag list out of a collection of tags. It is the reverse method of findTags. The tags will not be sorted.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type implementing the TagName interface
        Parameters:
        tags - the tag list
        Returns:
        the tag list as string, separated by a tag separator

      • combineTags

        String combineTags(String tagList,
                   String tagsToAdd)
        Combines two tags to a list.
        Parameters:
        tagList - A previous list of tags (or a single tag)
        tagsToAdd - The new tags to combine (or a single tag)
        Returns:
        The combined list

      • findOrCreateTags

        Pair<List<Tag>,List<String>> findOrCreateTags(String unparsedTags)
        Parses the tags and gets them from the database, and creates them if necassary.
        Parameters:
        unparsedTags - The unparsed tags
        Returns:
        A pair, where the left side are the created or found tags and the right site the tags with problems.

      • findTags

        List<Tag> findTags(String unparsedTags)
        Parses the tags and gets them from the database. If the tag is not existing it will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        unparsedTags - The unparsed tags
        Returns:
        The tags

      • getSeparator

        String getSeparator()
        Get the separator which separates the tags
        Returns:
        the separator

      • parseTags

        String[] parseTags(String unparsedTags)
        Parse a string of one or more tags into an array of tags. A null value will result in an empty array.
        Parameters:
        unparsedTags - The unparsed tags
        Returns:
        The tags
